effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate aWinning Streak! increasing the damage of your Stormstrike, Lava Lash and Doom Winds by 5%, up to 25%. Maelstrom Weapon spenders have a 1.0% chance to remove inning Streak! per Maelstrom Weapon spent.

(4) Set: When you lose your inning Streak! the winds shift into Doom Winds for 3 sec. When Doom Winds deal damage, your next Crash Lightning deals 12.0% increased damage, up to 60.0%. This effect can be stored up to 10 stacks. Additionally, Crash Lightning deals 75% more damage to your main target.

description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging abilities have a very high chance to charge the magnet, up to 30 times.

Use: Reverse the magnet's polarity to violently recycle buried garbage, dealing 71,599 Plague damage to your target per charge. Lingering virulence deals 10% of the damage dealt to 5 nearby enemies over 6 sec. (20 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

scendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.
